alert.note: Alert for Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 27 at 9:43AM CDT until May 03 at 3:01PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at Halstad affecting Traill and Norman Counties. Wild Rice River (ND) near Abercrombie affecting Richland County. Red River of the North at Drayton affecting Walsh, Kittson, Pembina and Marshall Counties. Red River of the North at Pembina affecting Kittson and Pembina Counties. Red River of the North at Oslo affecting Walsh, Polk, Marshall and Grand Forks Counties. Red River of the North at East Grand Forks affecting Polk and Grand Forks Counties. Red River of the North at Fargo affecting Cass and Clay Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River of the North at Halstad. * WHEN...Until Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 32.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 31.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 AM CDT Thursday was 32.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late Tuesday morning and continue falling to 24.1 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
